comment.note: Flood affected people moving to the nearest flood shelter in Hatibandha Upazila in Lalmonirhat Location: Hatibandha Sub-district in Lalmonirhat district at Northern Bangladesh. Date: August 13, 2017 Description/Context/Caption: Heavy rain triggers deadly flooding in North and northeastern14 districts of Bangladesh August 2017. The floodwaters have damaged bridges, drowned power lines and washed away thousands of homes. This image was taken by Kazi Altab, member of Emergency Response Committee (ERC), Hatibandha, Lalmonirhat. The ERC is initiated by ASOD (Concern PNGO) and assistance by Concern Worldwide Bangladesh. **CHECK WITH INTERNAL COMMS AND DESK** Photographer: Kazi Altab / Concern Worldwide
